synopsis.text:
Panda-loving superhero Anpanman and his friends embark on a thrilling journey to protect Obake Town, a place where everyone has the extraordinary ability to transform themselves, except for one resident named Dororin. When the Bakeru Carnival, a grand event showcasing the town's best transformers, rolls around, Dororin teams up with Cream Panda to find the legendary Black Cape, a magical cloak rumored to grant its wearer unparalleled transformation powers.

However, the villainous Baikinman has his sights set on the cape as well, intending to use its power to rule over Obake Town. As the Transformation Carnival unfolds, Anpanman, Cream Panda, and Dororin must work together to stop Baikinman and protect the town from his sinister grasp. Will our heroes be able to save the day and help Dororin discover his own transformation abilities? Join Anpanman and friends in this action-packed adventure!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
